query:
-- Validação completa
SELECT 
  'Clientes' as item,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade,
  'Mantidos intactos' as status
FROM clientes 
WHERE projectId = 1

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Clientes com nome' as item,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade,
  'OK' as status
FROM clientes 
WHERE projectId = 1 AND nome IS NOT NULL AND nome != ''

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Clientes enriquecidos' as item,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade,
  'Deve ser 0' as status
FROM clientes 
WHERE projectId = 1 AND validationStatus IS NOT NULL

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Mercados' as item,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade,
  'Deve ser 0' as status
FROM mercados_unicos 
WHERE projectId = 1

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Produtos' as item,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade,
  'Deve ser 0' as status
FROM produtos 
WHERE projectId = 1

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Concorrentes' as item,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade,
  'Deve ser 0' as status
FROM concorrentes 
WHERE projectId = 1

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Leads' as item,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade,
  'Deve ser 0' as status
FROM leads 
WHERE projectId = 1

UNION ALL

SELECT 
  'Associações' as item,
  COUNT(*) as quantidade,
  'Deve ser 0' as status
FROM clientes_mercados;
